ygData.subject: RE: Strange deaths in Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: At the time I got zapped, I was right near the zone border.  I was singing DDD so I probably aggroed something inside the castle.  Based on what John Kim said
ygData.messageBody:
At the time I got zapped, I was right near the zone border. I was singing
DDD so I probably aggroed something inside the castle. Based on what John
Kim said about LOS, that probably accounts for me gettting killed in one
shot even though I got no message indicating that I got hit.

Galtin of E'ci

> In the tunnel right as you enter MM you sometimes see a skeletal pet in
> the
> corner in front of you just standing around...it will leave you alone but
> if
> you attack it, its master on the other side of that wall which is deep
> within the castle, will kill you in a jiffy. Pick your fights wisely and
> DO
> NOT, I repeat DO NOT use AE songs in this zone unless you are very certain
> of where you are what you might affect that is on the other side of a
> wall...it is utterly deadly.
>
>
